participant_1.background:
I train my dogs and listen to death metal.
I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them!
i like long walks on the beach.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way.
i am 5 3 an love movie time.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
my favorite food to harvest is carrots.
I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Hey! I'm doing well, thanks! Excited for the weekend.
Me too! I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them.
That's so great! I'm sure it'll be a lot of fun.
I know it will be! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way.
Haha! Well, maybe you could go for a walk in the park instead? I love going for walks in the park.
That's a good idea! I love walking in the park too. I'm also a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
Wow! I've never been swimming in a lake before.
You should try it! It's so much fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What's your favorite food to harvest?
My favorite food to harvest is carrots. I love eating them fresh out of the garden.
Carrots are delicious! I love them too.
Me too! They're so sweet and crunchy.
I'm glad we agree on carrots!
